questions: Can you provide an overview of your experience in the Software Development industry over the past 11.5 years?
What specific technologies and programming languages are you proficient in?
Can you discuss a challenging project you worked on and how you successfully overcame any obstacles?
How do you stay updated on the latest trends and advancements in the software development field?
Have you taken on any leadership roles or managed a team in your career? If so, can you describe your approach to leadership and teamwork?
What motivates you to continue growing and advancing in your career in software development?
Can you share examples of how you have contributed to the success of previous projects or companies you have worked for?
How do you approach problem-solving and troubleshooting issues in software development?
Are you experienced in working with agile methodologies or other project management frameworks?
How do you ensure the quality and efficiency of the software solutions you develop?
